languages.text: "Священный вычислительный механизм великой мощи. Его тело обширно, а машинный дух сравним по мудрости и ретивости с теми, что обитают в Имперских Титанах. Машины подобных силы и величия строго скрываются от глаз мирян, почитаются на некоторых планетах за великих логис-оракулов, святых ангелов Омниссии, полубожеств. Ноль-Халиф включает в конструкцию образцы поразительного археотеха и распространен своими частями по Кьяве Гамма, словно спрут. Теперь у нас нет сомнений, откуда взялся варп-передатчик, модернизированный Кубисом Дельфимом — он явно был частью данного механизма".

"A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods. Null Caliph's structure includes remarkable pieces of archeotech, parts of it extending far throughout Kiava Gamma like a void kraken's tentacles. We now know where the warp transmitter modified by Cubis Delphim came from — it must have been part of this mechanism."
languages.original_text: "Священный вычислительный механизм великой мощи. Его тело обширно, а машинный дух сравним по мудрости и ретивости с теми, что обитают в Имперских Титанах. traits.locale_text: "Null Caliph is a sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. It is currently engaged in enigmatic calculations, and Procedure 0-Х is an important part of its sacred function."

languages.text: «Es un mecanismo computacional sagrado de poder inmenso. Su cuerpo es grandioso y la sabiduría y el temple de su espíritu máquina no estarían fuera de lugar en un Titán Imperial. Las máquinas tan poderosas y espléndidas como esta suelen guardarse lejos de la vista de los laicos y, en algunos planetas, se les venera como grandes oráculos del Logos, ángeles sagrados del Omnissiah e incluso semidioses. La estructura de Null Caliph se extiende por todo Kiava Gamma como lo tentáculos de un kraken del vacío. Ahora sabemos de dónde vino el transmisor de disformidad que modificó Cubis Delphim: debía de ser parte de este mecanismo».
languages.original_text: "A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods. Null Caliph's structure includes remarkable pieces of archeotech, parts of it extending far throughout Kiava Gamma like a void kraken's tentacles. We now know where the warp transmitter modified by Cubis Delphim came from — it must have been part of this mechanism."

traits.locale_text: «Es un mecanismo computacional sagrado de poder inmenso. Su cuerpo es grandioso y la sabiduría y el temple de su espíritu máquina no estarían fuera de lugar en un Titán Imperial. Las máquinas tan poderosas y espléndidas como esta suelen guardarse lejos de la vista de los laicos y, en algunos planetas, se les venera como grandes oráculos del Logos, ángeles sagrados del Omnissiah e incluso semidioses. La estructura de Null Caliph se extiende por todo Kiava Gamma como lo tentáculos de un kraken del vacío. Ahora sabemos de dónde vino el transmisor de disformidad que modificó Cubis Delphim: debía de ser parte de este mecanismo».

languages.text: « C'est un mécanisme sacré doté d'une puissance de calcul considérable. Sa carcasse imposante abrite un esprit de la machine doté d'un courage et d'une sagesse dignes d'un titan impérial. Les machines à ce point prodigieuses sont généralement cachées aux profanes, tandis que sur certaines planètes, on les vénère comme de grands logicoracles, des anges sacrés de l'Omnimessie, ou simplement des demi-dieux. La structure de Null Caliph contient des pièces archéotechniques remarquables, dont certaines parties s'étendent aux quatre coins de Kiava Gamma comme les tentacules d'un kraken du vide. Nous savons maintenant d'où provenait le transmetteur Warp modifié par Cubis Delphim : il devait faire partie de ce mécanisme. »
languages.original_text: "A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods. Null Caliph's structure includes remarkable pieces of archeotech, parts of it extending far throughout Kiava Gamma like a void kraken's tentacles. We now know where the warp transmitter modified by Cubis Delphim came from — it must have been part of this mechanism."

languages.text: “这是一台神圣的计算装置，拥有无比强大的力量。它的体积庞大，机魂非常聪慧、非常精巧，适合安装在帝国的泰坦上。如此伟大的机器，应该小心翼翼地保存起来，避开凡人无知的耳目，以免被无知的外行人误认为伟大的神谕者、欧姆尼塞亚的神圣天使，甚至误认为半神。虚无哈里发的结构包含某种无比精妙的远古科技部件，它的零件仿佛虚空海怪的触手，穿过了整颗基亚瓦伽马星。我们已经明白库比斯·德尔菲姆改造的亚空间发信器是从哪里来的了，那台发信器正是这台机器的一部分。”
languages.original_text: "A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods. Null Caliph's structure includes remarkable pieces of archeotech, parts of it extending far throughout Kiava Gamma like a void kraken's tentacles. We now know where the warp transmitter modified by Cubis Delphim came from — it must have been part of this mechanism."

“这是一台神圣的计算装置，拥有无比强大的力量。它的体积庞大，机魂非常聪慧、非常精巧，适合安装在帝国的泰坦上。如此伟大的机器，应该小心翼翼地保存起来，避开凡人无知的耳目，以免被无知的外行人误认为伟大的神谕者、欧姆尼塞亚的神圣天使，甚至误认为半神。虚无哈里发的结构包含某种无比精妙的远古科技部件，它的零件仿佛虚空海怪的触手，穿过了整颗基亚瓦伽马星。我们已经明白库比斯·德尔菲姆改造的亚空间发信器是从哪里来的了，那台发信器正是这台机器的一部分。”

languages.text: 「大いなる力を持つ神聖な計算機構。そのボディは巨大で、その機械精霊の知恵と気概は帝国の巨人にふさわしいものです。このような強大で壮麗な機械は、民衆の目から注意深く隠されており、特定の惑星では偉大なロジス・オラクル、万機神の聖なる天使、あるいは半神として崇拝されています。ヌル・カリフの建造物には驚くべき技術遺産の断片が含まれており、その一部はボイド・クラーケンの触手のようにキアヴァ・ガンマ全域に広がっています。キュービス・デルフィムによって改造されたワープ発信機が何に由来するのかがわかりました…この機構の一部に違いないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods. Null Caliph's structure includes remarkable pieces of archeotech, parts of it extending far throughout Kiava Gamma like a void kraken's tentacles. We now know where the warp transmitter modified by Cubis Delphim came from — it must have been part of this mechanism."

「大いなる力を持つ神聖な計算機構。そのボディは巨大で、その機械精霊の知恵と気概は帝国の巨人にふさわしいものです。このような強大で壮麗な機械は、民衆の目から注意深く隠されており、特定の惑星では偉大なロジス・オラクル、万機神の聖なる天使、あるいは半神として崇拝されています。ヌル・カリフの建造物には驚くべき技術遺産の断片が含まれており、その一部はボイド・クラーケンの触手のようにキアヴァ・ガンマ全域に広がっています。キュービス・デルフィムによって改造されたワープ発信機が何に由来するのかがわかりました…この機構の一部に違いないでしょう」

languages.text: "Ein heiliger Rechenmechanismus von gewaltiger Leistungsfähigkeit. Sein Körper ist gigantisch, und die Weisheit und der Mut seines Maschinengeists würden einem imperialen Titan gut zu Gesichte stehen. Maschinen von solcher Macht und solchem Glanz werden sorgfältig vor den Augen des Laienstands verborgen und auf manchen Planeten als große Logis-Orakel verehrt, als heilige Engel des Omnissiah oder als Halbgötter. Null Caliph enthält erstaunliche Stücke Archäotech, manche Teile erstrecken sich wie die Tentakel eines Leerenkraken durch ganz Kiava Gamma. Wir wissen nun, woher der von Cubis Delphim modifizierte Warp-Transmitter stammt: Er muss Teil dieses Mechanismus gewesen sein."
languages.original_text: "A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods. Null Caliph's structure includes remarkable pieces of archeotech, parts of it extending far throughout Kiava Gamma like a void kraken's tentacles. We now know where the warp transmitter modified by Cubis Delphim came from — it must have been part of this mechanism."

languages.text: "Hayli kudretli bir kutsal bilgisayım mekanizması. Heybetlidir, bir İmparatorluk Titanı gibi azimli ve bilgedir. Böylesi haşmetli ve görkemli makineler, ruhban dışı sınıftan titizlikle gizlenir. Bazı gezegenlerde ulu logis kâhinleri, Hermesih'in kutsal melekleri yahut yarı tanrılar yerine konup hürmet gördükleri olmuştur. Hiçlik Halifesi'nin bünyesinde kayda değer arkeotek eserleri bulunur. Bunların bazı parçaları, Kiava Gama'nın öte kısımlarına bir uçsuz krakeninin dokunaçları gibi uzanır. Artık Cubis Delphim'in değiştirdiği öteboyut vericisinin nereden geldiğini biliyoruz. Muhakkak bu mekanizmanın bir parçasıydı."
languages.original_text: "A sacred computational mechanism of great power. Its body is vast, and the wisdom and mettle of its machine spirit would befit an Imperial Titan. Machines of such might and splendour are kept carefully hidden from the eyes of the laity and worshipped on certain planets as great logis-oracles, sacred angels of the Omnissiah, or demigods.
